{"id":1071540360,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1696915613,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1071540360/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"43.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {\n        int ans = 0;\n\n        int n = nums.length;\n        int i = 0, j = 0; // initial pointer\n        int parentIdx = 0;\n\n        while(i < n) {\n\n            if(nums[i] != nums[j]) {\n                nums[parentIdx++] = nums[j];\n                j = i;\n                ans++;\n            }\n\n            i++;\n        }\n\n        nums[parentIdx] = nums[j];\n        return ans+1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
